title: For $45, get all the training you need to learn coding like a pro
text:
TLDR: This 2020 Learn to Code Bundle collects training in major coding languages and procedures that matter for under $50.

It occasionally feels like everybody in the world knows how to code these days. That certainty feels even more acute if you’re one of those luddites who doesn’t understand how JavaScript works or what Python is.

But before you start feeling like Betty White in a middle school lunchroom, take heart: even with an estimated 26 million programmers in the world, that still means only .003 percent of the world’s population actually know how to code.

Get way ahead of the curve now with The Premium 2020 Learn to Code Certification Bundle, a massive collection of intensive programming training available now for just $45 from TNW Deals.

This monster package includes 12 different courses that can get even first-time programmers comfortable with all the most fundamental coding concepts.

From core programming disciplines like HTML and CSS to database management to in-depth looks at app creation and machine learning, this package brings together all the tools to turn yourself into a full service, full-stack web developer.

Each of these 12 courses sells for at least $200, which is why you can show your brilliance by getting this limited-time bundle now to score all 12 for only $45, less than $4 each.
